lead_paragraph: The Russian Prosecutor General's office is reviewing a report by the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) which exposed wide-spread cheating and corruption in Russian athletics, TASS news agency cited Russian Sports Minister Vitaly Mutko as saying on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Russian Prosecutor General's Office Reviewing WADA Report: TASS
headline.main: Russian Prosecutor General's Office Reviewing WADA Report: TASS
